body:
Two things here:

(1) It feels like it would be better for `metaGraph` to be a field of the `SavedModel` structure instead of being an "output parameter" to `LoadSavedModel`.

(2) The signature here is a bit awkward, I'm thinking of some alternatives. Though, before that, am curious about the use case you have for providing custom run options to `LoadSavedModel`. Mind elaborating on that? (Note that these options only apply to the underlying `Session.run` call to restore the model parameters from the checkpoint, am curious which options you found the need to set)

body_text:
Two things here:
(1) It feels like it would be better for metaGraph to be a field of the SavedModel structure instead of being an "output parameter" to LoadSavedModel.
(2) The signature here is a bit awkward, I'm thinking of some alternatives. Though, before that, am curious about the use case you have for providing custom run options to LoadSavedModel. Mind elaborating on that? (Note that these options only apply to the underlying Session.run call to restore the model parameters from the checkpoint, am curious which options you found the need to set)
